query:
SELECT 
  campaignName,
  COUNT(*) as total_enrollments,
  SUM(CASE WHEN email1Sent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as email1_sent,
  SUM(CASE WHEN email2Sent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as email2_sent,
  SUM(CASE WHEN email3Sent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as email3_sent,
  SUM(CASE WHEN converted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as conversions
FROM fagorCampaignEnrollments 
GROUP BY campaignName;
